carnet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a small book of tickets that you can use on trains, buses etc
carnet.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an official document that allows you to go somewhere, especially to drive across the border into another country for a limited period
carnet.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a CUSTOMS document allowing someone to import goods into a country without paying DUTY, if they export them again within a particular time
